 Sends a text representation of all settings in s to the given stream.

Detailed Description

Aggregates all configurable settings within the application, currently providing initialization through hard-coded values in the constructor, with the planned future capability of loading from file.

Usage

Throughout the application, a pointer to a single RmSettings object is used so that settings changed during run time will take effect immediately.

Dependencies

RmUtility::SonarModelEnum

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RmSettings::RmSettings (   ) 
 

Attempts initialization via settings file or default values.

If settings file doesn't exist or contains invalid values, default values are used.

Member Data Documentation

float RmSettings::AlphaFactor
 

Multiplier on Murphy's alpha, the angle of a cell off a sonar's acoustic axis.

This isn't defined by Murphy, but was added with the intention of calibrating the resulting map. Experience showed this should be left at 1.0.

See also:
RmBayesSonarModel

float RmSettings::MaxEmpty
 

Specifies the cap on the probability of occupied for cells that fall within region II.

This isn't defined by Murphy, but has been seen in other literature, and has the effect of ensuring no probabilities in region II can be greater than this value, which would typically be 0.5.

See also:
RmBayesSonarModel

Definition at line 84 of file RmSettings.h.

Referenced by init(), invalids(), RmBayesSonarModel::prSnGivenOccupied(), put(), and write().
